title: Religion and Story for Sam Harris and Jordan Peterson
description:
Can we even talk about human life without story? To what degree are we in fact a story? 

Brett Weinstein on Marriage and Evolution https://youtu.be/zg7iBAgMT5Y 

http://slatestarcodex.com/2016/07/25/how-the-west-was-won/

Sunday School Class where I talk about God. https://youtu.be/_fK8Y6lxxKw 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
